name: NewYorker
text:
A piece by Jelani Cobb, from 2017.
https://t.co/6WgmAZswe5

name: NewYorker
text: On our latest podcast, Peter Hessler reports from Chengdu, China, on what life after lockdown looks like, and why the experience in the U.S. will be very different. Listen here. https://t.co/ygEqpKTeRc

name: NewYorker
text:
“So scary are the consequences of a collapse of white privilege that many Americans have flocked to a political platform that supports and translates violence against the defenseless as strength,” Toni Morrison wrote, in 2016.
https://t.co/iTgasxH70C

name: NewYorker
text:
Robin DiAngelo’s 2018 book “White Fragility” argues that our segregated society is set up to insulate whites from racial discomfort, so that they fall to pieces at the first application of stress.
https://t.co/KGBXOL4jW0

name: NewYorker
text: CNN has spoken out on behalf of Omar Jimenez, but we would be remiss not to interrogate how it has wrung the injustice that its reporter experienced for high-drama TV, @dstfelix writes. https://t.co/eHeEoNRSfa

name: NewYorker
text: “When I have my camera on me, I don’t forget that I’m a black human being,” the photographer Chris Facey said. “I remember why I’m at these protests.” https://t.co/9LSctNWvXs

name: NewYorker
text:
On our latest podcast, @xwaldie picks three novels to bring humor to dark times. Listen here, or wherever you get your podcasts.
https://t.co/x45kVYMWJK

name: NewYorker
text: A new video shows New York City's eerily empty landscape, with commentary from front-line medical personnel and essential workers whose work continues, off camera. https://t.co/uCm3h8j1cI

name: NewYorker
text: The German pianist Igor Levit is used to playing carefully chosen programs at concert halls all over the world. At home, he can choose whatever pieces ﬁt his mood. https://t.co/6t3J2BXJoo

name: NewYorker
text: Facebook has never been a neutral platform—it is a company whose business model depends on monitoring its users, modifying and manipulating their behavior, and selling their attention to the highest bidder. https://t.co/mWdbMunJxa
